#### React Tools

##### Development Toolkits and Frameworks
* [[ **⭐ 63086 | 👁️ 1759 | 🔀 13847** ] Create React App](https://github.com/facebookincubator/create-react-app) - Create React apps with no build configuration.
* [[ **⭐ 6223 | 👁️ 134 | 🔀 508** ] Razzle](https://github.com/jaredpalmer/razzle) - Create server-rendered universal JavaScript applications with no configuration.
* [[ **⭐ 4187 | 👁️ 69 | 🔀 259** ] nwb](https://github.com/insin/nwb) - A toolkit for React, Preact, Inferno & vanilla JS apps, React libraries and other npm modules for the web, with no configuration (until you need it).
